snippet: The country is expected to reach its target of 7.5 percent this year, but its government was urged to keep up overhauls to fix debt problems.
abstract: World Bank says China is likely to meet its economic growth target of 7.5 percent in 2014.
lead_paragraph: The country is expected to reach its target of 7.5 percent this year, but its government was urged to keep up overhauls to fix debt problems.

headline.main: World Bank Says China’s Growth Is on Track
headline.print_headline: China’s Growth Improving, World Bank Reports
